TABLE.NAME: livequiz
TABLE.COMMENT: The settings for each live quiz.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard Moodle primary key.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the live quiz.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: The course that this live quiz belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Introduction text for the live quiz.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the introduction text.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the record was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the record was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: activity_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the activity from moodle (used when deleting).

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Title of the question

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the question.

FIELD.NAME: timelimit
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional time limit for the question.

FIELD.NAME: explanation
FIELD.COMMENT: Explanation of the right answer, after the students have answered.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of question, eg. multiple choice, one choice, etc.

FIELD.NAME: correct
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not this answer option is correct.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: The text which describes this answer option.

FIELD.NAME: explanation
FIELD.COMMENT: Explanation of why this answer is correct or incorrect.

TABLE.NAME: livequiz_quiz_student
TABLE.COMMENT: Relationship table between Students and Quiz

FIELD.NAME: student_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of a student who is participating in a quiz

KEY.NAME: fk_livequiz
KEY.COMMENT: key to a quiz in which a student is participating

KEY.NAME: fk_student
KEY.COMMENT: Key to student who is participating in a course

TABLE.NAME: livequiz_quiz_lecturer
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps track the creator(s) of a quiz.

FIELD.NAME: lecturer_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Id to the lecturer that created this quiz

FIELD.NAME: quiz_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID to the quiz that a lecturer made.

TABLE.NAME: livequiz_quiz_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: Relationship table between quizzes and questions.

FIELD.NAME: quiz_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key of the question.

FIELD.NAME: question_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key of the question.

TABLE.NAME: livequiz_questions_answers
TABLE.COMMENT: Relationship table between questions and answers!

FIELD.NAME: question_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID to the relevant question.

FIELD.NAME: answer_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID to the relevant answer.

TABLE.NAME: livequiz_questions_lecturer
TABLE.COMMENT: Relationship table between questions and lecturers(users).

FIELD.NAME: question_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID to the question.

FIELD.NAME: lecturer_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID to the lecturer, which is a user.

TABLE.NAME: livequiz_students_answers
TABLE.COMMENT: Relationship table between students and answers.

FIELD.NAME: student_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the student.

FIELD.NAME: answer_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID to the answer.

FIELD.NAME: participation_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID refers to the foreign key of a participation, meaning a field in the livequiz_student relationship table.

KEY.NAME: fk_participation
KEY.COMMENT: Key to a row in participates/livequiz_quiz_student

TABLE.NAME: livequiz_course_quiz
TABLE.COMMENT: Relationship table between live quiz and course.

FIELD.NAME: course_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course.

FIELD.NAME: quiz_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the quiz.
